		if (!!(navigator.userAgentData && navigator.userAgentData.mobile) || navigator.userAgent.indexOf("Mobile") !== -1){
			return true;
		}
		else {
			return false;
		}
	}

	if ('serviceWorker' in navigator && !isMobile()) {
		navigator.serviceWorker.register('/sw.js').then(function(registration) {
			console.log('ServiceWorker registration successful with scope: ', registration.scope);
			navigator.onLine && navigator.serviceWorker.controller && navigator.serviceWorker.controller.postMessage('BANDWIDTH_COMPUTE');
			navigator.serviceWorker.addEventListener('message', function (event) {
				try {
					const bandwidthData = JSON.parse(event.data);
					if (bandwidthData && bandwidthData.data) {
						window.bandwidth = bandwidthData.data.downlink + '_' + bandwidthData.data.computeMethod + '_' + bandwidthData.data.effectiveType + '_' + bandwidthData.data.type;
					}
				}catch(err) {
					console.error('JSON.parse failed:', err);
				}
			});
		})
		.catch(function(err) {
			console.error('ServiceWorker registration failed: ', err);
		});
	} else if('serviceWorker' in navigator && isMobile()){
        navigator.serviceWorker.getRegistration().then(function(registration) {
            var serviceWorkerUnregistered=false;
            if(registration) {
                registration.unregister();
                serviceWorkerUnregistered=true;
            }
            serviceWorkerUnregistered && window.location.reload();
        });

			console.error('ServiceWorker registration failed: ', err);
		});

                registration.unregister();
                serviceWorkerUnregistered=true;

    window.s_isDesktop = true;</script><script nonce="11608727760222031402">function isMobile(){
		if (!!(navigator.userAgentData && navigator.userAgentData.mobile) || navigator.userAgent.indexOf("Mobile") !== -1){
			return true;
		}
		else {
			return false;
		}
	}

	if ('serviceWorker' in navigator && !isMobile()) {
		navigator.serviceWorker.register('/sw.js').then(function(registration) {
			console.log('ServiceWorker registration successful with scope: ', registration.scope);
			navigator.onLine && navigator.serviceWorker.controller && navigator.serviceWorker.controller.postMessage('BANDWIDTH_COMPUTE');
			navigator.serviceWorker.addEventListener('message', function (event) {
				try {
					const bandwidthData = JSON.parse(event.data);
					if (bandwidthData && bandwidthData.data) {
						window.bandwidth = bandwidthData.data.downlink + '_' + bandwidthData.data.computeMethod + '_' + bandwidthData.data.effectiveType + '_' + bandwidthData.data.type;
					}
				}catch(err) {
					console.error('JSON.parse failed:', err);
				}
			});
		})
		.catch(function(err) {
			console.error('ServiceWorker registration failed: ', err);
		});
	} else if('serviceWorker' in navigator && isMobile()){
        navigator.serviceWorker.getRegistration().then(function(registration) {
            var serviceWorkerUnregistered=false;
            if(registration) {
                registration.unregister();
                serviceWorkerUnregistered=true;
            }
            serviceWorkerUnregistered && window.location.reload();
        });
    }</script> <script async="" defer="defer" id="omni_script" nonce="11608727760222031402" src="///www/linchpin/batman-returns/omni/omni16.js"></script> <script nonce="11608727760222031402">window._pxAppId = 'PXgNtTli3A';</script><script async="" nonce="11608727760222031402" src="///px/gNtTli3A/init.js"></script></body></html><!DOCTYPE html>

			return true;
		}
		else {
			return false;

		navigator.serviceWorker.register('/sw.js').then(function(registration) {
			console.log('ServiceWorker registration successful with scope: ', registration.scope);
			navigator.onLine && navigator.serviceWorker.controller && navigator.serviceWorker.controller.postMessage('BANDWIDTH_COMPUTE');

					if (bandwidthData && bandwidthData.data) {
						window.bandwidth = bandwidthData.data.downlink + '_' + bandwidthData.data.computeMethod + '_' + bandwidthData.data.effectiveType + '_' + bandwidthData.data.type;

				}catch(err) {
					console.error('JSON.parse failed:', err);

			});
		})
		.catch(function(err) {
			console.error('ServiceWorker registration failed: ', err);
		});

                registration.unregister();
                serviceWorkerUnregistered=true;
            }

		}
		else {
			return false;

			navigator.onLine && navigator.serviceWorker.controller && navigator.serviceWorker.controller.postMessage('BANDWIDTH_COMPUTE');

						window.bandwidth = bandwidthData.data.downlink + '_' + bandwidthData.data.computeMethod + '_' + bandwidthData.data.effectiveType + '_' + bandwidthData.data.type;

					console.error('JSON.parse failed:', err);

			});
		})
		.catch(function(err) {
			console.error('ServiceWorker registration failed: ', err);
		});

            if(registration) {
                registration.unregister();
                serviceWorkerUnregistered=true;
            }
            serviceWorkerUnregistered && window.location.reload();

		if (!!(navigator.userAgentData && navigator.userAgentData.mobile) || navigator.userAgent.indexOf("Mobile") !== -1){
			return true;
		}
		else {
			return false;
		}

	if ('serviceWorker' in navigator && !isMobile()) {
		navigator.serviceWorker.register('/sw.js').then(function(registration) {
			console.log('ServiceWorker registration successful with scope: ', registration.scope);
			navigator.onLine && navigator.serviceWorker.controller && navigator.serviceWorker.controller.postMessage('BANDWIDTH_COMPUTE');

				try {
					const bandwidthData = JSON.parse(event.data);
					if (bandwidthData && bandwidthData.data) {
						window.bandwidth = bandwidthData.data.downlink + '_' + bandwidthData.data.computeMethod + '_' + bandwidthData.data.effectiveType + '_' + bandwidthData.data.type;
					}
				}catch(err) {
					console.error('JSON.parse failed:', err);
				}
			});
		})
		.catch(function(err) {
			console.error('ServiceWorker registration failed: ', err);
		});
	} else if('serviceWorker' in navigator && isMobile()){
        navigator.serviceWorker.getRegistration().then(function(registration) {

            if(registration) {
                registration.unregister();
                serviceWorkerUnregistered=true;
            }
            serviceWorkerUnregistered && window.location.reload();
        });

		}
		else {
			return false;

		.catch(function(err) {

		});

		if (!!(navigator.userAgentData && navigator.userAgentData.mobile) || navigator.userAgent.indexOf("Mobile") !== -1){
			return true;
		}
		else {
			return false;
		}
	}

	if ('serviceWorker' in navigator && !isMobile()) {
		navigator.serviceWorker.register('/sw.js').then(function(registration) {
			console.log('ServiceWorker registration successful with scope: ', registration.scope);
			navigator.onLine && navigator.serviceWorker.controller && navigator.serviceWorker.controller.postMessage('BANDWIDTH_COMPUTE');
			navigator.serviceWorker.addEventListener('message', function (event) {
				try {
					const bandwidthData = JSON.parse(event.data);
					if (bandwidthData && bandwidthData.data) {
						window.bandwidth = bandwidthData.data.downlink + '_' + bandwidthData.data.computeMethod + '_' + bandwidthData.data.effectiveType + '_' + bandwidthData.data.type;
					}
				}catch(err) {
					console.error('JSON.parse failed:', err);
				}
			});
		})
		.catch(function(err) {
			console.error('ServiceWorker registration failed: ', err);
		});
	} else if('serviceWorker' in navigator && isMobile()){
        navigator.serviceWorker.getRegistration().then(function(registration) {
            var serviceWorkerUnregistered=false;
            if(registration) {
                registration.unregister();
                serviceWorkerUnregistered=true;
            }
            serviceWorkerUnregistered && window.location.reload();
        });
    }</script> <script async="" defer="defer" id="omni_script" nonce="13849770061749021963" src="///www/linchpin/batman-returns/omni/omni16.js"></script> <script nonce="13849770061749021963">window._pxAppId = 'PXgNtTli3A';</script><script async="" nonce="13849770061749021963" src="///px/gNtTli3A/init.js"></script></body></html><!DOCTYPE html>

		if (!!(navigator.userAgentData && navigator.userAgentData.mobile) || navigator.userAgent.indexOf("Mobile") !== -1){
			return true;
		}
		else {
			return false;
		}

		navigator.serviceWorker.register('/sw.js').then(function(registration) {
			console.log('ServiceWorker registration successful with scope: ', registration.scope);
			navigator.onLine && navigator.serviceWorker.controller && navigator.serviceWorker.controller.postMessage('BANDWIDTH_COMPUTE');
			navigator.serviceWorker.addEventListener('message', function (event) {
				try {
					const bandwidthData = JSON.parse(event.data);
					if (bandwidthData && bandwidthData.data) {
						window.bandwidth = bandwidthData.data.downlink + '_' + bandwidthData.data.computeMethod + '_' + bandwidthData.data.effectiveType + '_' + bandwidthData.data.type;

				}catch(err) {
					console.error('JSON.parse failed:', err);
				}
			});
		})
		.catch(function(err) {
			console.error('ServiceWorker registration failed: ', err);
		});
	} else if('serviceWorker' in navigator && isMobile()){
        navigator.serviceWorker.getRegistration().then(function(registration) {
            var serviceWorkerUnregistered=false;
            if(registration) {
                registration.unregister();
                serviceWorkerUnregistered=true;
            }
            serviceWorkerUnregistered && window.location.reload();
        });

			return true;
		}
		else {
			return false;

		navigator.serviceWorker.register('/sw.js').then(function(registration) {

			navigator.onLine && navigator.serviceWorker.controller && navigator.serviceWorker.controller.postMessage('BANDWIDTH_COMPUTE');

					console.error('JSON.parse failed:', err);

			});

		.catch(function(err) {
			console.error('ServiceWorker registration failed: ', err);
		});

                registration.unregister();
                serviceWorkerUnregistered=true;

		if (!!(navigator.userAgentData && navigator.userAgentData.mobile) || navigator.userAgent.indexOf("Mobile") !== -1){
			return true;
		}
		else {
			return false;
		}
	}

	if ('serviceWorker' in navigator && !isMobile()) {
		navigator.serviceWorker.register('/sw.js').then(function(registration) {
			console.log('ServiceWorker registration successful with scope: ', registration.scope);
			navigator.onLine && navigator.serviceWorker.controller && navigator.serviceWorker.controller.postMessage('BANDWIDTH_COMPUTE');
			navigator.serviceWorker.addEventListener('message', function (event) {
				try {
					const bandwidthData = JSON.parse(event.data);
					if (bandwidthData && bandwidthData.data) {
						window.bandwidth = bandwidthData.data.downlink + '_' + bandwidthData.data.computeMethod + '_' + bandwidthData.data.effectiveType + '_' + bandwidthData.data.type;
					}
				}catch(err) {
					console.error('JSON.parse failed:', err);
				}
			});
		})
		.catch(function(err) {
			console.error('ServiceWorker registration failed: ', err);
		});
	} else if('serviceWorker' in navigator && isMobile()){
        navigator.serviceWorker.getRegistration().then(function(registration) {
            var serviceWorkerUnregistered=false;
            if(registration) {
                registration.unregister();
                serviceWorkerUnregistered=true;
            }
            serviceWorkerUnregistered && window.location.reload();
        });

    if(window.location.host === 'www.flipkart.com' || /\.store\.flipkart\.com/i.test(window.location.host)){
        window.s_account = "flipkart-prd"; //omniture account id
    }else{

    window.s_isDesktop = true;</script><script nonce="15705870549764505407">function isMobile(){
		if (!!(navigator.userAgentData && navigator.userAgentData.mobile) || navigator.userAgent.indexOf("Mobile") !== -1){
			return true;
		}
		else {
			return false;
		}
	}

	if ('serviceWorker' in navigator && !isMobile()) {
		navigator.serviceWorker.register('/sw.js').then(function(registration) {
			console.log('ServiceWorker registration successful with scope: ', registration.scope);
			navigator.onLine && navigator.serviceWorker.controller && navigator.serviceWorker.controller.postMessage('BANDWIDTH_COMPUTE');
			navigator.serviceWorker.addEventListener('message', function (event) {
				try {
					const bandwidthData = JSON.parse(event.data);
					if (bandwidthData && bandwidthData.data) {
						window.bandwidth = bandwidthData.data.downlink + '_' + bandwidthData.data.computeMethod + '_' + bandwidthData.data.effectiveType + '_' + bandwidthData.data.type;
					}
				}catch(err) {
					console.error('JSON.parse failed:', err);
				}
			});
		})
		.catch(function(err) {
			console.error('ServiceWorker registration failed: ', err);
		});
	} else if('serviceWorker' in navigator && isMobile()){
        navigator.serviceWorker.getRegistration().then(function(registration) {
            var serviceWorkerUnregistered=false;
            if(registration) {
                registration.unregister();
                serviceWorkerUnregistered=true;
            }
            serviceWorkerUnregistered && window.location.reload();

		if (!!(navigator.userAgentData && navigator.userAgentData.mobile) || navigator.userAgent.indexOf("Mobile") !== -1){
			return true;
		}
		else {
			return false;
		}

	if ('serviceWorker' in navigator && !isMobile()) {
		navigator.serviceWorker.register('/sw.js').then(function(registration) {
			console.log('ServiceWorker registration successful with scope: ', registration.scope);
			navigator.onLine && navigator.serviceWorker.controller && navigator.serviceWorker.controller.postMessage('BANDWIDTH_COMPUTE');
			navigator.serviceWorker.addEventListener('message', function (event) {
				try {
					const bandwidthData = JSON.parse(event.data);
					if (bandwidthData && bandwidthData.data) {
						window.bandwidth = bandwidthData.data.downlink + '_' + bandwidthData.data.computeMethod + '_' + bandwidthData.data.effectiveType + '_' + bandwidthData.data.type;
					}
				}catch(err) {
					console.error('JSON.parse failed:', err);
				}
			});
		})
		.catch(function(err) {
			console.error('ServiceWorker registration failed: ', err);
		});
	} else if('serviceWorker' in navigator && isMobile()){
        navigator.serviceWorker.getRegistration().then(function(registration) {
            var serviceWorkerUnregistered=false;
            if(registration) {
                registration.unregister();
                serviceWorkerUnregistered=true;
            }
            serviceWorkerUnregistered && window.location.reload();
        });

    window.s_isDesktop = true;</script><script nonce="17932800845319166084">function isMobile(){
		if (!!(navigator.userAgentData && navigator.userAgentData.mobile) || navigator.userAgent.indexOf("Mobile") !== -1){
			return true;
		}
		else {
			return false;
		}
	}

	if ('serviceWorker' in navigator && !isMobile()) {
		navigator.serviceWorker.register('/sw.js').then(function(registration) {
			console.log('ServiceWorker registration successful with scope: ', registration.scope);
			navigator.onLine && navigator.serviceWorker.controller && navigator.serviceWorker.controller.postMessage('BANDWIDTH_COMPUTE');
			navigator.serviceWorker.addEventListener('message', function (event) {
				try {
					const bandwidthData = JSON.parse(event.data);
					if (bandwidthData && bandwidthData.data) {
						window.bandwidth = bandwidthData.data.downlink + '_' + bandwidthData.data.computeMethod + '_' + bandwidthData.data.effectiveType + '_' + bandwidthData.data.type;
					}
				}catch(err) {
					console.error('JSON.parse failed:', err);
				}
			});
		})
		.catch(function(err) {
			console.error('ServiceWorker registration failed: ', err);
		});
	} else if('serviceWorker' in navigator && isMobile()){
        navigator.serviceWorker.getRegistration().then(function(registration) {
            var serviceWorkerUnregistered=false;
            if(registration) {
                registration.unregister();
                serviceWorkerUnregistered=true;
            }
            serviceWorkerUnregistered && window.location.reload();
        });
    }</script> <script async="" defer="defer" id="omni_script" nonce="17932800845319166084" src="///www/linchpin/batman-returns/omni/omni16.js"></script> <script nonce="17932800845319166084">window._pxAppId = 'PXgNtTli3A';</script><script async="" nonce="17932800845319166084" src="///px/gNtTli3A/init.js"></script></body></html>
